text:
="preserve">Sir Leonard John Chalstrey (17 March 1931 – 12 March 2020) was a British consultant surgeon. He served as the 668th Lord Mayor of London from 1995 to 1996. In 1995, he was also master apothecary of the Worshipful Society of Apothecaries.
Chalstrey died on 12 March 2020 at the age of 88.
